tool_description: This API allows to get Corporate & Personal Taxes/ Social Security Rates for Company and Employees.  All the Data Sources are from: trading economics
title: Taxes and Social Security Rates

api_list.name: Get Social Security Rate For Employees by Continent
api_list.description: This endpoint Returns Get Social Security Rate For Employees by Continent or Group
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://taxes-and-social-security-rates.p.rapidapi.com/taxesSSE/{taxsseid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "taxes-and-social-security-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
